Job Title: Senior Product Manager

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
Job Title: Senior Product Manager - Connected Vehicle Safety
Company Overview: HAAS Alert is a pioneering technology company leading the charge in transforming emergency vehicle safety. Specializing in innovative solutions for connected vehicles, we are committed to enhancing safety, efficiency, and communication for emergency responders and road users alike. As we expand and innovate, we seek an experienced and visionary Senior Product Manager to spearhead our product team.
Position Overview:This role is for those who thrive in the trenches of a scaling startup. You'll be the vanguard of our product management team, with the opportunity to shape and expand it as we grow. As the Senior Product Manager, you'll play a pivotal role in driving product vision, strategy, and execution, collaborating closely with customers, internal teams, and market trends to craft groundbreaking solutions for connected transportation globally.
Responsibilities:Product Strategy and Vision:Craft and communicate a compelling product vision and strategy in alignment with company goals and market dynamics.Lead the product team in defining and articulating the roadmap for current and future product offerings.Market Research and Customer Insights:Conduct thorough market research to discern customer needs, industry trends, and competitive landscapes.Garner valuable customer insights through direct engagement, surveys, and feedback mechanisms to inform product evolution.Cross-Functional Collaboration:Foster close collaboration with engineering, design, marketing, and sales teams to ensure cohesive execution of the product roadmap.Cultivate a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the product organization.Product Development and Lifecycle Management:Oversee the complete product development lifecycle, from ideation to launch and beyond, ensuring timely and high-quality delivery of product releases.Navigate competing priorities effectively while maintaining a focus on delivering exceptional user value.Team Leadership and Development:Lead, mentor, and inspire a high-performing product management team, fostering a culture of accountability, creativity, and growth.Champion a collaborative and inclusive environment that encourages innovation and professional development.Stakeholder Communication:Effectively communicate product strategies and updates to internal and external stakeholders, serving as a spokesperson for our offerings at industry events and conferences.
Qualifications:Demonstrated track record of leadership in Product Management, with a history of successfully launching innovative products.Deep understanding of connected vehicle technologies, IoT, and emerging trends in automotive and public safety sectors.Exceptional strategic thinking and analytical abilities, with a knack for translating market insights into actionable product plans.Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and inspire cross-functional teams.Previous experience in a startup or fast-paced technology environment is advantageous.
Education and Experience:Bachelor's degree in Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.Minimum of 7 years of experience in product management, including at least 2 years in a leadership capacity.Familiarity with Category Creators and experience with Jira preferred.Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite is required, along with previous experience owning product ownership entirely.
Join us in shaping the future of emergency vehicle safety through cutting-edge technology solutions.
We encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
